anya-e0103n5:2_1: Yathāvitthāritassa atthassa atidesopi vitthāraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha “vitthārakathā hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n5:2_5: Ettakampīti “kate vā akate vāti sabbaṁ vitthāretabba”nti ettakampi avatvā.
anya-e0103n5:6_1: Akate gaṇhantassāti vuttanayena yathā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṁ paññāyati,
anya-e0103n5:6_2: evaṁ anabhisaṅkhate kevale tejasmiṁ nimittaṁ gaṇhantassa.
anya-e0103n5:8_9: Samasīsaṭṭhitanti upari pattānaṁ vasena samasīsaṁ hutvā ṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:8_10: Veḷuṁ vā rukkhaṁ vāti etthāpi “samasīsaṁ ṭhitaṁ ghanapattaveḷuṁ vā ghanapattarukkhaṁ vā”ti ānetvā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:8_13: viraḷesu anuppavesato vātappahāro na paññāyatīti caturaṅgulappamāṇaggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n5:8_15: Etasmiṁ ṭhāne paharatīti satiṁ ṭhapetvāti ucchaggādīnaṁ pacalanākāraggahaṇamukhena tesaṁ pahārake vātasaṅghāte satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0103n5:8_16: Tattha satiṁ ṭhapetvāti tasmiṁ kāyapadesassa saṅghaṭṭanavasena pavatte vāyupiṇḍe saṅghaṭṭanākāraggahaṇamukhena satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0103n5:8_17: “Usumavaṭṭisadisa”nti etena purimakasiṇassa viya imassāpi nimittassa saṁviggahataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n5:8_18: “Niccala”nti iminā niccalabhāvoyeva uggahanimittato imassa visesoti paṭibhāganimittassāpi usumavaṭṭisadisatāva vibhāvitā hoti.
anya-e0103n5:10_6: Pattehiyevāti nīluppalādīnaṁ kesaravaṇṭāni apanetvā kevalehi pattehiyeva.
anya-e0103n5:10_7: Pūretabbanti nīlavaṇṇaṁ vatthaṁ gahetvā bhaṇḍikaṁ viya bandhitvā yathā nīlamaṇḍalaṁ hutvā paññāyati,
anya-e0103n5:10_8: tathā caṅkoṭakaṁ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṁ vā pūretabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:18_1: tassa obhāsamaṇḍalassa na ciraṭṭhititāya tathā nimittuppādanaṁ kātuṁ asakkontena.
anya-e0103n5:18_5: Ghanavippasannaṁ ālokapuñjasadisanti bhagavato byāmappabhā viya bahalo,
anya-e0103n5:18_6: vippasanno ca hutvā puñjabhūto āloko atthi ce,
anya-e0103n5:20_4: “Vaḍḍhiyamānampi na vaḍḍhatī”ti uggahanimittassa avaḍḍhanīyataṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:20_5: Sabbampi hi uggahanimittaṁ vaḍḍhiyamānaṁ na vaḍḍhatiyeva.
anya-e0103n5:20_6: Satipi ca vaḍḍhetukāmatāyaṁ vaḍḍhanā na sambhavati bhāvanāya paridubbalattā.
anya-e0103n5:20_8: Paṭibhāganimittaṁ pana tasmiṁ uppanne bhāvanā thirāti katvā “vaḍḍhiyamānaṁ vaḍḍhatī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:21_0: Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṁ “pathavīkasiṇādīni rūpajhānārammaṇāni aṭṭheva kasiṇāni sarūpato āgatāni,
anya-e0103n5:21_2: ākāsakasiṇe ca paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṁ antogadhaṁ katvā desanā katā”ti adhippāyenāha “iti kasiṇāni dasabalo,
anya-e0103n5:21_4: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṁ tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kasiṇe paṭiniyatameva atthaṁ aggahetvā asādhāraṇato,
anya-e0103n5:21_5: sādhāraṇato ca tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṁ visaṭaṁ atthaṁ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n5:23_1: saddena yassa kassaci pathavīpakkhiyassa vatthuno nimmānādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n5:23_2: Ṭhānanisajjādikappanaṁ vāti etthāpi “ākāse vā udake vā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:24_0: Yadeva so icchati tassa ḍahanasamatthatāti bahūsu kappāsapicusāradāruādīsu ekajjhaṁ rāsibhūtesu ṭhitesu yaṁ yadeva icchati,
anya-e0103n5:26_0: Suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā suvaṇṇabhāvādhiṭṭhānaṁ seyyathāpi āyasmā pilindavaccho tiṇaṇḍupagapāsādādīnaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:28_1: Imaṁ pabhedaṁ labhantīti imaṁ vaḍḍhanādivisesaṁ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n5:29_4: Pubbe vaḍḍhanakāle payojanaṁ anapekkhitvā vaḍḍhentānaṁ vasena vuttattā idāni “tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṁ pasāretī”ti āha,
anya-e0103n5:29_7: Uddhañce rūpaṁ daṭṭhukāmo uddhaṁ ālokaṁ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n5:29_8: adho ce rūpaṁ daṭṭhukāmo adho ālokaṁ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n5:29_9: samantato ce rūpaṁ daṭṭhukāmo samantato ālokaṁ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n5:30_3: Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
anya-e0103n5:30_6: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesena pharaṇappamāṇassa aggahaṇato pharaṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:30_9: Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ālambanaṁ karonto.
anya-e0103n5:30_10: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṁ parittaṁ vā vipulaṁ vā ekakkhaṇe sakalameva manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n5:31_1: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikāti ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhi natthikadiṭṭhīti tīsu micchādiṭṭhīsu yāya kāyaci niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatā.
anya-e0103n5:32_2: tampi nibbānādhigamatthameva kattukamyatāchandaṁ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n5:32_3: Uttarakurukāpi manussā mārādayo viya acchandikaṭṭhānaṁ paviṭṭhā nibbutichandarahitattā.
anya-e0103n5:32_5: “Bhavaṅgapaññāya paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṁ lokuttarassa pādakaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0103n5:32_7: Yasmiṁ hi bhavaṅge vattamāne taṁsantatiyaṁ lokuttaraṁ nibbattati,
anya-e0103n5:33_5: Tasmāti yasmā ete vipākantarāyādayo evaṁ atthajānikarā,
anya-e0103n5:33_7: Tiṇṇameva cettha antarāyānaṁ gahaṇaṁ itarassa sappaṭikārattā,
